LanguageData.ColonistDuel.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between -6 and 6 mood for 6 days.
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.comps.1.label: leader present
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.comps.2.label: duelist dies
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.comps.3.label: weapon used
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.extraPredictedOutcomeDescri: Duelists and viewers will gain melee combat experience.
Spectators will gain a mood boost and fill their recreation bars.
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.outcomeChances.0.descriptio: The duel was terrible! The fighters bumbled around, ineptly avoiding each other in a extended display of cowardice and weakness. Watching it just made people sad.
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.outcomeChances.1.label: Boring
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.outcomeChances.1.descriptio: The duel was boring. The fighters wouldn't commit, so there were no exciting moments.
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.outcomeChances.2.label: Good
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.outcomeChances.2.descriptio: The duel was good. The fighters went for blood and showed real heart.
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.outcomeChances.3.label: Unforgettable
LanguageData.ColonistDuel.outcomeChances.3.descriptio: The duel was unforgettable! Both fighters gave all they had.
